roleset.name: conforming to a religion

role.descr: entity conforming to a religion, adhering to rules

example.name: arg0
example.text: I take it u are very religious ??

roleset.name: doing something with zealous consistency

role.descr: thing done (or domain) with zealous consistency

example.name: both args
example.text: I was religious about my little boys daytime naps.
example.arg: about my little boys daytime naps.
